channel.title: New command/poles/npc dancing with poles
channel.description:
how do i make a command where u tele to a remote spot
2 how do i put permanint poles in the room
3. how do i make girl npcs dance with the poles
4 make command ::strippers
can some one tell me step by step on how to do that commands are not my fortay

item.title: New command/poles/npc dancing with poles
item.dc:creator: @pokemonn pokemonn
item.description:
@pokemonn wrote:

i can do it for 317 just not 508 im new to 508 and i was thinking the emotes climb rope and lean and cry and blow kiss and panic one and the dance and the becon emotes and use a flag pole for pole but how do i make npc do those emotes randomly and how do i make it so there on stage like faldor party room or mime stage and there stripping and stuff the npcs i want to use are 2776 and 3227 please help

Read full topic

item.title: New command/poles/npc dancing with poles
item.dc:creator: @young_pure42 young pure42
item.description:
@young_pure42 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:3, topic:353211”][quote author=young pure42 link=topic=449520.msg3298007#msg3298007 date=1281070452]

how do i make a command where u tele to a remote spot

2 how do i put permanint poles in the room

  1. how do i make girl npcs dance with the poles

4 make command ::strippers

can some one tell me step by step on how to do that commands are not my fortay

You are an idiot that is impossible to do.
[/quote]
You are even more of an idiot for thinking it is impossible.

@TOPIC - You will need to:

[ul][li]Create a custom object (the pole)[/li]
[li]Create an animation for the female[/li][/ul]

It is really just too much work for a perverted little tike like yourself.[/quote]
It is impossible for him hes doesnt know how to make a teleport, object, or npc let alone an animation so obviously it will be impossible for him.

Read full topic
